summary: A seedy night-club owner recruits eight violent gangsters for an elaborate heist. But when they all begin to compare notes, they find they're pawns in a dangerous game of double-cross.
cast: Eric Roberts|Joe Pantoliano|Tia Carrere|Tony Curtis|Clarence Williams III|William Forsythe|Chris Rock|Kevin Bernhardt|Kieran Mulroney|Brian T. Finney|Michael Paul Chan|Alex Meneses|Oleg Vidov|Roger Marks|Nick Nahas|Al Cutillo|Anthony T. Pennello|Peewee Piemonte|Gary Paul|Metin Bereketli|Patrick Scott Havens|Todd Gordon|Alisa Christensen|Brent Bolthouse|Louis Lombardi|Gregg Marc Miller|Derik Hixson|Al Goto|James Lew|Audra Lee Janairo|Tiffany Granath|Joel Leder|Greg Joung Paik|Kim Kim|Will Leong|Michael Tamburro|Craig Trager|Sharon Soboil|Humberto Arechiga|Brian Grant|Lisa Abukusumo
title: Muerte anunciada
